alert.note: Alert for Broome; Tioga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 3:59PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Broome and southeastern Tioga Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 359 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Berkshire to near Lounsberry. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Vestal, Johnson City, Endicott, Maine, Owego, Nanticoke, Berkshire, Newark Valley, Whitney Point and Lisle. This includes the following highway exits... New York Interstate 81 between 7 and 8. Interstate 86/Route 17 between 63 and 71, and near 71 South. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms.
